question: "The Port of Chittagong" is the seaport of which one of the following nations?
explanation: The Port of Chittagong is the busiest seaport of Bangladesh. it is located on the coastline of Bay of Bengal. It is located on the banks of the Karnaphuli river. It is an ancient seaport even appeared on Ptolemy's map. The trade happened with ancient Egypt and Mesopotamia is through this seaport.
